docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay-- This country became Latin America's first and most notable welfare state at the turn of the Century when its most esteemed modern hero. President Jose Batlle y. Ordonez gave his countrymen the highest standard of living south of...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay-- This country became Latin America's first and most notable welfare state at the turn of the Century when its most esteemed modern hero. President Jose Batlle y. Ordonez gave his countrymen the highest standard of living south of the Rio Grande.

docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO, Jan. 12  Brazil proposed today that the rest of the Western Hemisphere get along with Cuba on a liveand-let-live basis.
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, Jan. 12 Brazil proposed today that the rest of the Western Hemisphere get along with Cuba on a liveand-let-live basis.
docs.abstract: Min Dantas (Brazil) urges Hemisphere live-and-let-live policy on Cuba, statement to Hemisphere Ambs, Rio de Janeiro; would bar intervention in Cuba if Cuba agrees not to intervene in other nations; sees Cuba interested in returning to inter-Amer system

headline.main: HEMISPHERE CODE ON CASTRO URGED; Brazil Bids Americas Adopt Live-and-Let-Live Policy
